item.description:
We will start with a relaxation exercise and a concentration exercise or guided meditation. Then I will read a passage on meditation or other related topics from the Great Masters of different paths/religions/philosophy. And then we can share our experience or insights following this meditation.
This meet up will meet for about an hour.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ring the bell on the front porch and I will open the door
item.name: Cambridge Meditation November Meetup
